features: Free of gluten and alcohol - our California Body Lotion has a rich, creamy texture designed for everyone's gentle and safe use. It is free of gluten and alcohol, making it ideal for individuals who avoid these ingredients or simply prefer a clean, irritation-free recipe.

Suitable for all skin types - Whether your skin is normal, oily, or dry, our body lotion will nourish you richly and lusciously. Its composition is gentle on sensitive skin while also hydrating dry skin.

100% vegan - Our organization is committed to a cruelty-free and entirely vegan culture. Our Luxury California Body Lotion is wholly created from non-animal ingredients; therefore, no animal products will be utilized.
Vegetarian Practice - The Vegetarian Society has recognized that our dedication to veganism is genuine. The vegan-approved seal ensures that our premium body lotion meets their high vegan criteria.

PETA Certified Cruelty-Free: Our commitment to ethical practices is not limited to the substances we utilize. PETA accreditation ensures that no animals were injured in the development of our Luxury California Body Lotion, which adheres to our cruelty-free values.
description: Product Description Brand History - APPLE & BEARS is an esteemed British cosmetics brand cherished and managed by a family. Our expertise lies in crafting opulent products, exclusively curated with the highest-quality organic and natural ingredients. Our products, created by a team of experts, are designed for everyone and formulated with extensive knowledge of natural and herbal ingredients. We adopt a responsible approach to our manufacturing process, prioritising ethics and environmental friendliness. Our commitment extends beyond product quality to the impact on the planet and its inhabitants. Treat your skin to the indulgence of APPLE & BEARS Luxury California Body Lotion, a premium cosmetic masterpiece. This product seamlessly combines luxury with a profound affinity for nature, promising an unmatched sensory journey. Immerse yourself in the revitalizing aroma of our 100% natural fragrance, intricately designed to awaken your senses and transport you to a realm of pure bliss. Gentle enough for all skin types, this gluten- and alcohol-free body lotion delivers a luxuriously nourishing experience. Its natural ingredients work in harmony to deeply hydrate and revitalize your skin, leaving it feeling soft, smooth, and irresistibly supple. More than just a moisturizer, APPLE & BEARS Luxury Body Lotion is a testament to our unwavering commitment to natural beauty. Embrace the Californian spirit and treat your skin to the ultimate indulgence. Let every application be your gateway to a world of pure relaxation and rejuvenation. Home Luxury Diffusers Long-Lasting Aromatherapy Vegetarian Society approved Made In England 125 ml Luxury Candles Premium Quality Oil Elegant Packaging Made In England 220g Skincare Products Body Wash (100ml, 300ml, 500ml) Hand Wash (300ml) Body Lotion (100 ml, 300 ml) Made In England Natural Hydration and Revitalization - Packed with natural ingredients, this body lotion works harmoniously to deeply hydrate and revitalize your skin. The natural components contribute to a deep and lasting moisturization, leaving your skin feeling irresistibly soft, smooth, and supple. Premium Quality with Natural Fragrance - Beyond being a moisturiser, this body lotion is a premium cosmetic masterpiece. The seamless blend of luxury and a profound love for nature is evident in its 100% natural fragrance. The intricately designed scent awakens your senses, offering a unique and indulgent sensory journey. Unwavering Commitment to Natural Beauty - Luxury California Body Lotion transcends mere skincare; it embodies a dedication to natural beauty. This product stands as a testament to the brand's unwavering commitment to providing the ultimate indulgence for your skin. Relaxation and Rejuvenation - Each application of APPLE & BEAR's Luxury California Body Lotion is an invitation to a world of pure relaxation and rejuvenation. The product not only cares for your skin but also creates an immersive experience, allowing you to escape into a realm of pure bliss with every use. Pomegranate & Aloe Vera Infused with the hydrating benefits of Aloe Vera and the refreshing essence of Pomegranate, our products provide a deeply moisturizing elixir that promotes a healthy and supple complexion. Pomegranate is loaded with antioxidants like polyphenols and vitamin C, which help protect the skin from oxidative stress and damage caused by free radicals. Bergamot & Green Tea Revitalize your body and mind with our Body Wash infused with Organic Bergamot and Green Tea, providing a refreshing and invigorating experience. This antioxidant boost can contribute to a healthier complexion, reducing signs of premature ageing and promoting a more youthful appearance. Grapefruit & Seaweed Experience the vibrant burst of grapefruit and the refreshing essence of seaweed, creating a dynamic and revitalizing fragrance that invigorates the senses. Seaweed, with its unique blend of antioxidants, also contributes to a comprehensive defence against environmental stressors. California Explore the rejuvenating power of Aloe Vera Juice and Sage Water in our, nourishing your skin with a burst of natural hydration and promoting a radiant and refreshed complexion. Safflower seed oil possesses anti-inflammatory properties, making it suitable for soothing irritated and sensitive skin.
